body_html:
Thanks @vrv .

As far as I can tell, I'm not initializing any variable based on another one and I only have a single call to an init opp.
Your suggestion is at the limits of my understanding of TF. Could you point me at the right docs to understand how to go about "try to find which GPU variable is being read on CPU, " ?
Thanks
